name: lempinstall
text: Install Apache/PHP/MySQL\nMariaDB root password: %1\nRequires internet connection
shortDescription: Install a full web server on your Raspberry Pi. Requires internet connection.
longDescription: NGINX is a web server, and combined with PHP and MariaDB it makes for a great way for beginners to experiment with web development, and also experienced users to easily run their websites. This downloads packages from the Raspbian repository, and therefore requires an internet connection.
